Package it.unibz.inf.bl

Class AuctionManager

java.lang.Object
it.unibz.inf.bl.AuctionManager
public class AuctionManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manager class that manages all actions involving auctions, e.g., opening an auction and placing a bid.
It also takes care of loading Auction and Bid objects into the Model
Author:
Manuel Pillon, Daniel Summerer

      Parameters:
      target - Timestamp to be checked
      lowerBound - Lower bound
      upperBound - Upper bound
      Returns:
      true if the given timestamp is in the specified range, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • searchBidsForAuction

      Searches bids placed on a given auction
      Parameters:
      auctionID - ID of the auction
      Returns:
      The list of bids that have been placed on the auction with given ID

    • searchHighestBid

      public static Bid searchHighestBid​(java.util.List<Bid> bids)
      Searches for the highest bid from a list of bids
      Parameters:
      bids - List of bids to search in
      Returns:
      The Bid object whose price attribute is the highest in the list, or null if the list is a null reference or empty

    • openAuction

      public static Auction openAuction​(int itemID, java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, java.lang.String startPrice)
      Opens an auction on the specified item
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item
      startDate - Start date of the auction
      endDate - End date of the auction
      startPrice - Start price for the auction
      Returns:
      The Auction object, if the auction has been opened, false otherwise

    • placeBid

      public static Bid placeBid​(int userID, int auctionID, java.sql.Timestamp bidTime, java.lang.String price)
      Places a bid on an auction
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the user that places the bid
      auctionID - ID of the auction to place the bid on
      bidTime - Timestamp when the bid was placed
      price - Price
      Returns:
      The Bid object, if the bid has been created, false otherwise
